definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: tribe, people (Ar. 0’um=ah;un; As. ummatu cf. Jen:Kosmol. 336, Aram. 0umto0, [[אוּמָּא]]) only pl. [[אֻמּוֹת]] Nu 25:15; [[אֻמִּים]] Ps 117:1; sf. [[אֻמּׂתָם]] Ge 25:16; —of tribes of Ishmaelites Ge 25:16; of Midian (‖[[בֵּית־אָב]]) Nu 25:15; ‖[[גּוֹיִם]] Ps 117:1.
